title: Cautious Employer
description: We maintain a professional employer-employee relationship where I employ cosmic_wanderer at my Bottega at Ruga dei Tagiapiera, with a moderate level of trust (47.4/100) but minimal relationship strength (1.1/100). Our connection is primarily transactional, with cosmic_wanderer working at my establishment while I manage employee-related issues including hunger impacts on productivity across my businesses.
